${ModID}:FriendSentry.NAME: Friendly Sentry
${ModID}:FriendSentry.FLAVOR: "The answer? Use a laser. And if that don't work...use more lasers." - The Architect
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of odd turns, add an #yInsight into your discard pile.

${ModID}:SnakeSlough.NAME: Snake Slough
${ModID}:SnakeSlough.FLAVOR: You hear whistling and mad cackling from far away...
DESCRIPTIONS: Start of each combat with #b%s #yDexterity [REMOVE_SPACE]. Every #b%s turns, gain #yTemporary #yStrength equal to your #yDexterity [REMOVE_SPACE].
